  • Field Details

    • TIME_ZONE_SETTING_KEY

      static final String TIME_ZONE_SETTING_KEY
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • getValidZoneId

      static ZoneId getValidZoneId(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin)
      Resolves the configured timezone string into a valid ZoneId.

      If the timezone value is present in the configuration and matches one of the available ZoneId recoginized by the JVM, it is used. Otherwise, this method falls back to the system default time zone.

      Parameters:
      plugin - the plugin whose configuration is queried for the timezone
      Returns:
      a valid ZoneId, or the system default if no valid setting is found

    • get

      LocaleSetting get()
      Returns the resolved LocaleSetting based on the plugin configuration.
      Specified by:
      get in interface ConfigProvider<LocaleSetting>
      Returns:
      a locale setting encapsulating a LanguageTag

    • getLanguageTag

      LanguageTag getLanguageTag()
      Returns the resolved LanguageTag representing the locale tag.
      Returns:
      a valid LanguageTag

    • getLocale

      Locale getLocale()
      Returns the Locale object derived from the configuration.
      Returns:
      a Java Locale

    • getZoneId

      ZoneId getZoneId()
      Returns the configured ZoneId if valid, or the system default otherwise.
      Returns:
      the applicable time zone as represented by a ZoneId object.
